Loan Processor

You’ll be part of our small loan processing team located across our Ventura and Thousand Oaks offices. CMS’s ability to succeed depends on the effort and energy you contribute to the team. Your main goal is to keep loan progress on track by obtaining investor loan approval and by working closely with our internal teams, investors, Escrow companies and other third parties.

Your Role Responsibilities 

  • Ensure compliance and quality by reviewing credit, income and collateral for loan qualification; and identifying any outstanding items needed for the loan process and promptly submitting to investor for approval.
  • Meet loan turn times by working cohesively with investors and internal teams throughout the process.  You will obtain loan approval and clear loan conditions by proactively following up on outstanding conditions and submitting complete, accurate and organized documentation for quick processing by the investor.  You will also place clear, concise and complete orders for closing disclosures, loan docs and funding’s within the appropriate timeframes for each loan.
  • Create a positive client and team experience by being responsive and taking prompt and appropriate action to deliver on the needs of our clients, team members, business partners and investors.
  • Maintain high quality work by staying organized and informed in a way that allows you to run a pipeline of 30-35 loans.
  • Hit monthly company targets by collaborating well with the team and proactively managing your training and development needs.
  • Drive innovation by sharing well informed ideas that can improve our business.
  • Be adaptable and supportive by being prepared to adjust quickly to changing business and market needs.
  • Show flexibility by accepting that this role description may not cover all your duties and the business may require you to take on different or additional responsibilities as needed.

Some skills you’ll need

  • Confidence working in a paperless environment.
  • Microsoft Outlook, Word and Excel.
  • Ability to learn PowerPoint, Publisher and other programs as needed.
  • We’re a mortgage company and we deal with a lot of numbers; a solid understanding of mathematics is a must.

Loan Coordinator 

You’ll be part of our small coordinating team located across our Ventura and Thousand Oaks offices. CMS’s ability to succeed depends on the effort and energy you contribute to the team. Your main goal is to keep loan progress on track by coordinating documentation and communication with multiple parties, such as; customers, loan officers, processing and closing teams, real estate agents, and escrow companies.

Your Role Responsibilities 

  • Ensure regulatory compliance by quickly and accurately drafting and issuing loan disclosures for client signature.
  • Create a positive client and team experience by being responsive and taking prompt and appropriate action to deliver the needs of our clients, team members, business partners, and investors. Keeping all necessary parties informed using their preferred method of communication and using terms they understand.
  • Meet loan turn-times by proactively anticipating actions and documentation needed during transactions; request those items, following up and analyze to ensure they are complete, accurate, and sufficient.
  • Maintain high-quality work by staying organized and informed in a way that allows you to run a pipeline of 25-30 loans.
  • Hit monthly company targets by collaborating well with the team and proactively managing your training and development needs.
  • Drive innovation by sharing well-informed ideas that can improve our business.
  • Be adaptable and supportive by being prepared to adjust quickly to changing business and market needs.
  • Show flexibility by accepting that this job description may not cover all your duties and the business may require you to take on different or additional responsibilities as needed.

Some skills you’ll be using 

  • Confidence working in a paperless environment.
  • Microsoft Outlook, Word, and Excel.
  • Ability to learn PowerPoint, Publisher, and other programs as needed.
  • We’re a mortgage company and we deal with a lot of numbers; a solid understanding of mathematics is a must.

Loan Closer

You’ll be part of our small closing team located across our Ventura and Thousand Oaks offices. CMS’s ability to succeed depends on the effort and energy you contribute to the team. Your main goal is to keep loan progress on track by issuing closing disclosures, loan docs, and funding loans.

Responsibilities

  • Ensure compliance by quickly and accurately drawing CD’s, loan docs, and funding loans that comply with CMS, Investor, and regulatory requirements.
  • Maintain high quality by proactively working with Processor, Loan Officer, Investor, and Escrow to understand the transaction and deliver accuracy the first time.
  • Create a positive client and team experience by being responsive and taking prompt and appropriate action to deliver on the needs of our clients, team members, business partners, and investors.
  • Meet loan turn-times by staying organized and informed in a way that allows you to successfully deliver CD, doc, and funding requests.
  • Hit monthly company targets by collaborating well with the team and proactively managing your training and development needs.
